text: Bobby Few (October 21, 1935 â€“ January 6, 2021) was an American jazz pianist and singer. He played with saxophonist Charles Gayle and led his own trio in Paris. He was working on a Booker Ervin tribute project called Few's Blues. Few died on January 6, 2021 aged 85. ==References== ==Other websites== *[ AllMusic biography] *All About Jazz * * * * Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American jazz singers Category:American jazz musicians Category:American pianists Category:Musicians from Cleveland Category:Singers from Cleveland
